metadata.name: PSAsyncShell - Asynchronous TCP Reverse Shell
metadata.comment: Detects the use of PSAsyncShell an Asynchronous TCP Reverse Shell written in powershell

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('psasyncshell')))

output.summary: Detects the use of PSAsyncShell an Asynchronous TCP Reverse Shell written in powershell
